subject: Re: [junit] Junit 4.7 and maven
msgSnippet: Jeff, Kent and I do not publish to maven repositories.  Whatever is there has been placed there by someone else.  If someone is willing to take on this
messageBody:
Jeff,

Kent and I do not publish to maven repositories. Whatever is there
has been placed there by someone else. If someone is willing to take
on this responsibility, and there's something I could do to make their
life easier, please let me know!

David Saff

On Wed, Jun 10, 2009 at 6:26 PM, Paul King<paulk@...> wrote:
>
> I use 4.6 from here:
>
> http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/4.6/
>
> Jeff wrote:
>>
>>
>>
>> I noticed that the most recent versioin of junit in maven's ibiblio
>> repository is 4.3. Is there someplace that more recent versions reside?
>> If not, the jars there should be updated.
>>
>> In particular, when is 4.7 going to be be available via maven? I'd love
>> to use it but only once it is in a public repository.
>>
>> Jeff
>>
>>
